articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Second initiative launch of the week 👀
Introducing @d_d_agency_web3 - "a collective venture builder focused on investing our time into pushing forward web3 products and services" 
👇
D_D Agency: During the last months, we've been working on a new concept to take even further what @developer_dao could offer to the ecosystem.
🚀 𝗗_𝗗 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝗰𝘆 🚀
If you need services or a partner to design, develop, or lead a new web3 product, reach out!
 https://agency.developerdao.com

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
🚨 SCAM ALERT 🚨
We're seeing some fake D_D Twitter accounts pop up with a scam claim link in their bio. They're RT'ing and interacting with community posts.
Please ensure you're only trusting officially channels:
@developer_dao http://developerdao.com http://claim.developerdao.com

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Orbis, the web3 social protocol
New to building web3 socials via Orbis?
We've released a simple @viamirror guide to three important @ceramicnetwork data concepts:
SCHEMA
DATA OBJECT
STREAM
You can dive in via the link in the comments.
Congrats @adamjmdawson for a great read!
